page.title: 15AIRPORT
page.content: A NEW TERMINAL BUILDING WAS OPENED IN 1984 AND COVERS 40 HECTARES. ON THE GROUND FLOOR IS A SHOP RUN BY W.H.SMITH, HOTEL INFORMATION, BANK, TELEPHONES,POST-BOX,CAR HIRE AND LIFTS TO OTHER FLOORS. ON THE FIRST FLOOR THERE ARE RESTAURANTS,CAFE BARS,MAGLEV STATION,DUTY FREE SHOP,LOUNGES FOR PASSENGERS,FLIGHT INFORMATION,FLIGHT ARRIVAL AND DEPARTURE RECEPTIONS. ON THE TOP FLOOR ARE THE ADMINISTRATION OFFICES AND VIEWING LOUNGE. THE NEW TERMINAL BUILDING HAS BEEN BUILT WHERE THERE WERE FARM FIELDS BEFORE. THE TERMINAL CAN HANDLE 3 MILLION PASSENGERS A YEAR. THERE ARE STANDS FOR 20 AIRCRAFT. THE 11 INTERNATIONAL FLIGHT STANDS HAVE MOVABLE BRIDGES,THE OTHER 9 STANDS ARE FOR DOMESTIC AND INTERNAL FLIGHTS. YOU CAN GET TO 16 DIFFERENT CONTRIES,AND 28 AIRLINES USE THE AIRPORT.
